Process Yearly Data Format

Source: R/wp_data.r
in_process_yearly_data.Rd

Internal function that reformats yearly data to match quarterly data structure by duplicating yearly values in Q1.

Used by: in_adjust_columns_to_frequency Uses: None

Features:

  • Copies yearly values to Q1

  • Removes Q2-Q4 columns

  • Maintains data integrity

  • Preserves metadata columns

Usage

in_process_yearly_data(symbol_data)

Arguments

symbol_data

data.frame; yearly data to process

Value

data.frame with quarterly structure
